subjectExercises.title: Practicing the Hand Signs
subjectExercises.description: This exercise will help you practice the hand signs for each letter of the alphabet.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Identify the hand sign for the letter 'A'.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The hand sign for 'A' is represented by the first image.
The hand sign for 'A' is made by forming a triangle with the thumb extended.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Match each letter to its corresponding hand sign.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The correct matches are: A - second image, C - third image, B - first image.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Identify the hand sign for the letter 'V'.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The hand sign for 'V' is represented by the third image.
The hand sign for 'C' is made by forming a 'C' shape with the hand.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Match each letter to its corresponding hand sign.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The correct matches are: D - third image, Q - second image, P - first image.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Identify the hand sign for the letter 'X'.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The hand sign for 'X' is represented by the second image.
The hand sign for 'E' is made by forming a 'E' shape with the fingers.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Match each letter to its corresponding hand sign.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The correct matches are: G - second image, E - first image, Y - third image.

subjectExerciseQuestions.text: Identify the hand sign for the letter 'D'.
subjectExerciseQuestions.feedback: The hand sign for 'D' is represented by the second image.
